{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the relevant documents, cardenolides are indeed inhibitors of Na+/K+ ATPase. Document [1] mentions that cardenolides specifically inhibit Na+/K+-ATPase, which is essential for many physiological processes.
